attributes.action: ensure that all members of the England Women's Cricket team are recognised in the Queens honours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The England Women's cricket team has just won a second world cup. They are now, reigning 50 over and T20 World Cup Champions, and are an inspiration to millions of young sports women. 
They should now be correctly recognised, just like the Men’s Cricket (Ashes 2005) England Rugby (World Cup 2003) and our Olympic heroes.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
